main event: An observer reported sighting a disc-shaped unidentified flying object in Mesa, Arizona on September 8, 1951.
interesting points: The object was approximately 50-60 feet in diameter.,The sighting lasted for about 15 seconds.,The object moved at a high rate of speed and was observed at high altitude.,No sound was reported during the sighting.,The investigation was part of Project Blue Book but no definitive explanation was provided.
witness description: The witness was standing outside his home.
